record1.<1>:
declare function Utility


CFOpt = ""
CFOpt<1> = 0		;* open mode
CFOpt<2> = "Bitmaps (*.BMP)/*.BMP/Jpegs (*.JPG)/*.jpg/All Files (*.*)/*.*/"
CFOpt<3> = 1		;* default type is the first one (bitmaps)
CFOpt<6> = 'bmps'

File = Utility("CHOOSEFILE", @window, CFOpt)

if file then
	.pic_filename->text=file
end

return 0
